= Eclipse Setup to Inherit Other Source modules =

 #. Right click project > select properties > Libraries tab > Add other projects ./src folder
 #. then goto Projects tab > Add other project
 #. put this in the project.gwt.xml file -> <inherits name='com.gawkat.gwt.project'/>
 #. goto debug configurations > project > classpath > user entries > add project
 #. then add src folder > goto Advanced > add folder > select src folder
